message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  I'm asking for $20,000.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $18,000 is a bit lower than I hoped for, I'm willing to come down to $19,000 to make this work.  This product truly is valuable and I'm confident you'd be happy with it.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $18,000 and $19,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $18,500?
